summary: Each year, we make more than 1,000 recommendations to help improve the federal government. We alert department heads to the recommendations where they can save the most money, address issues on our High Risk List , or significantly improve government operations. This report outlines our 12 priority open recommendations for NASA as of April 2020. For example, we recommended that NASA develop a complete cost...
title: Priority Open Recommendations: National Aeronautics and Space Administration
